channel.title: Market Insights on YWallet
channel.description: Recent content in Market Insights on YWallet

item.title: Budget
item.description: The Budget Page has two parts. At the top, you have a table showing the top addresses you have sent funds to in the past 30 days, At the bottom, you have a chart showing the historical balance of your account (excluding transparent transactions)

item.title: Price Chart
item.description: The chart takes values from the Binance exchange in near real-time. The lowest granularity is 1 minute per candle and can go up to 1 month. Candle width Chart A candle has the open, high, low, and close price for a given interval and is either green or red based on whether the close price is greater or lower than the open price.
